MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 13-JAN-2021 23:56.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the KA8 postcode area of Ayr, affecting properties in Cowan Crescent and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 8:43PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. If this information changes we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:50PM on 13 January 2021
